text:
96th Street is a station on the IRT Lexington Avenue Line of the New York City Subway. Located at the intersection of 96th Street and Lexington Avenue on the Upper East Side, Carnegie Hill and East Harlem neighborhoods of Manhattan. It is served by the <6> train at all times and <6> train during rush hours in the peak direction and <4> train during late nights.
After this station, the next stations will be 103rd Street and 86th Street stations.
